Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Dermaseptin 01 (Dermaseptin-O1; DRS-01, DRS-O1; DRS 01; DRS01; DS-01; DS 01; DShypo 05; XXA; Ala-rich; UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; ZZP)
Sequence Information.Source: Phyllomedusa oreades, Brazil, South America; alsoPhyllomedusa hypochondrialis

Literature Information.Literature: C-terminal NH2. A=34%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 6.4 uM), S. aureus (MIC 3.2 uM), and X. axonopodis. Also active against parasites S. mansoni, T. cruzi, and L. amazonesis.Alternative source: Also found in Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis (Brand GD et al., 2006).  Found in multiple species.Surface immobilized peptide: TBA. Updated 12/2015; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Brand GD, Leite JR, Silva LP, Albuquerque S, Prates MV, Azevedo RB, Carregaro V, Silva JS, Sá VC, Brandão RA, Bloch C Jr.2002
Literature Information.Title: Dermaseptins from Phyllomedusa oreades and Phyllomedusa distincta. Anti-Trypanosoma cruzi activity without cytotoxicity to mammalian cells.
